PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: At Locaplus, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information.

infoCollection.title: Information We Collect
infoCollection.description: When you fill out the quote request form on our website, we collect the information you provide, such as your name, email address, phone number, and event details.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: The information you provide is used solely to respond to your request and provide a quote. We do not store your personal information beyond what is necessary to reply to your inquiry.

retention.title: Retention of Information
retention.description: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected, or as required by law.

protection.title: Protection of Your Information
protection.description: We take reasonable steps to ensure the information you provide is securely transmitted.
